abstract: At least five people are killed in Indian state of Punjab as gunmen in Indian Army uniforms fire on civilian bus and take over police station; gunmen are killed in extended shootout with police; five bombs are found wired to railroad tracks in area.
lead_paragraph: The attackers, who were said to be dressed in Indian Army uniforms, stormed the police station after opening fire on an intercity bus in Punjab, the police said.

headline.main: Gunmen in Indian Army Uniforms Attack Bus and Police Station, Killing 5
headline.print_headline: Gunmen in Indian Army Uniforms Attack Bus and Police Station, Killing 5

snippet: The attackers, who were said to be dressed in Indian Army uniforms, stormed the police station after opening fire on an intercity bus in Punjab, the police said.
